Table of Contents

V4Input Directory Structure

This section describes how files are organized within the XTMF project input directory. Depending on your base version of GTAModel the exact structure will change. If your model system was constructed outside of TMG please contact your provider for your model's specific layout.

Note

There is a significant change in file structure starting in GTAModel V4.0.2 and continuing into GTAModel V4.1 in order to help organize model runs.

GTAModel Versions

Below are links to the inpput directories for the different GTAModel V4 base models:

  1. GTAModel V4.0.1
  2. GTAModel V4.0.2
  3. GTAModel V4.1
  4. GTAModel V4.2
